actions.name: Delta Stream

cost.trigger: The user enters combat or when the user gains this Ability.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user enters combat.

Effect: Connection - Tailwind. Wind Weather is set until it is overridden or if the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or leaves combat. If the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or leaves combat while Wind Weather is present, Wind Weather will remain for 3 Rounds.

actions.name: Delta Stream (Active)
actions.description: Intense Winds Weather is set until it is overridden or the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or leaves combat. If the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or leaves combat while Intense Winds is present, the Weather is set to Wind for 5 Rounds.
